arts.ttl: Bournemouth 1-2 Man City: Player ratings as Cityzens reach seventh straight FA Cup semi-final
arts.sum: The same player then created the decisive strike for fellow sub Omar Marmoush, replacing the injured Haaland, just over an hour in. Bournemouth took a lead into the break through Evanilson, turning in Justin Kluivert's goal-bound attempt, before a refreshed City turned it round in the second 45.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth 1-2 Man City: Match report & 4 talking points as substitutions change outcome of FA Cup clash
arts.sum: Erling Haaland made amends for an earlier missed penalty by equalising almost straight after the restart, before Omar Marmoush won it for Pep Guardiola’s side. Pep Guardiola made a telling substitution at half-time, replacing the carded Khusanov with Nico O’Reilly, tasking the home-grown midfielder with filing in at left-back but getting forward freely.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola claims Man City rediscovered their 'heart and soul' in Bournemouth win - as he singles out one star among 'legendary' squad
arts.sum: JAMES SHARPE: Pep Guardiola believes his legendary Manchester City players rediscovered their 'heart and soul' to secure their place in a seventh successive FA Cup semi.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth players must put FA Cup heartbreak behind them and push for Europe, insists manager Andoni Iraola
arts.sum: Iraola says Bournemouth must pick themselves up quickly from the disappointment of a 'missed opportunity' to reach their first-ever FA Cup semi-final if they are to fulfil their Euro dreams.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola hits back at a BIG misconception about his management style and highlights 'outstanding' Man City feat in sassy interview after FA Cup quarter-final win at Bournemouth
arts.sum: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola claimed football fans have misunderstood his teams over the years after beating Bournemouth in the FA Cup quarter-finals .

arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer news update: Enzo Maresca to target Barcelona defender as 'priority' option over Dean Huijsen
arts.sum: Chelsea will reportedly look to target a Barcelona defender as their priority defensive reinforcement ahead of Bournemouth centre-back Dean Huijsen in the summer window.

arts.ttl: Man City secure comeback win at Bournemouth to reach FA Cup semi-finals
arts.sum: Erling Haaland had an eventual afternoon on the south coast.

arts.ttl: Forest await Cherries in semifinal if Bournemouth beat Man City
arts.sum: Should the Cherries beat Manchester City in the FA Cup, they will face Nottingham Forest at Wembley in the semifinal.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Manchester City - FA Cup: Live score, team news and updates as Erling Haaland has early penalty SAVED in battle to reach Wembley semi
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates as Bournemouth host Manchester City in the quarter-finals of the FA Cup at Vitality Stadium.

arts.ttl: FA Cup semi-finals: Bournemouth or City to play Forest as Palace face Villa
arts.sum: The winners of the FA Cup quarter-final between Bournemouth and Manchester City will face Nottingham Forest in the last four, while Crystal Palace will play Aston Villa in the semi-finals.
